NetCDF structure for 'israel_caves-2025.nc'

netcdf netcdf4 {
dimensions:
	time = 15700 ;
	cave = 12 ;
	logger = 42 ;
	reference = 21 ;
variables:
	NC_INT time(time) ;
		NC_CHAR time:standard_name = "time" ;
		NC_CHAR time:coverage_content_type = "coordinate" ;
		NC_CHAR time:long_name = "time stamp" ;
		NC_CHAR time:units = "hours since 2019-09-19 06:00:00" ;
		NC_CHAR time:calendar = "gregorian" ;
	NC_INT cave(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR cave:long_name = "Record number of a cave" ;
		NC_CHAR cave:coverage_content_type = "coordinate" ;
	NC_INT logger(logger) ;
		NC_CHAR logger:long_name = "Record number of a logger" ;
		NC_CHAR logger:coverage_content_type = "coordinate" ;
	NC_INT reference(reference) ;
		NC_CHAR reference:long_name = "reference id" ;
		NC_CHAR reference:coverage_content_type = "coordinate" ;
	NC_STRING RefCitation(reference) ;
		NC_CHAR RefCitation:long_name = "Reference for the previous study of a cave" ;
		NC_CHAR RefCitation:coverage_content_type = "auxiliaryInformation" ;
	NC_BYTE cave_references(reference, cave) ;
		NC_CHAR cave_references:long_name = "Variable for mapping caves with references" ;
		NC_CHAR cave_references:coverage_content_type = "auxiliaryInformation" ;
	NC_BYTE logger_cave_mapping(logger, cave) ;
		NC_CHAR logger_cave_mapping:long_name = "Logger-Cave mapping variable" ;
		NC_CHAR logger_cave_mapping:coverage_content_type = "referenceInformation" ;
	NC_BYTE crs ;
		NC_CHAR crs:long_name = "Coordinate reference system" ;
		NC_CHAR crs:coverage_content_type = "referenceInformation" ;
		NC_CHAR crs:grid_mapping_name = "latitude_longitude" ;
		NC_DOUBLE crs:longitude_of_prime_meridian = 0 ;
		NC_DOUBLE crs:semi_major_axis = 6378137 ;
		NC_DOUBLE crs:inverse_flattening = 298.257223563 ;
	NC_STRING Cave_Name(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Cave_Name:long_name = "The cave name as it appears in previous academic publications" ;
		NC_CHAR Cave_Name:coverage_content_type = "referenceInformation" ;
	NC_STRING Region(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Region:standard_name = "region" ;
		NC_CHAR Region:coverage_content_type = "referenceInformation" ;
		NC_CHAR Region:long_name = "Geographical region of cave location" ;
	NC_FLOAT Longitude(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Longitude:standard_name = "longitude" ;
		NC_CHAR Longitude:coverage_content_type = "coordinate" ;
		NC_CHAR Longitude:long_name = "Longitude" ;
		NC_CHAR Longitude:units = "degrees_east" ;
		NC_CHAR Longitude:grid_mapping = "crs" ;
	NC_FLOAT Latitude(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Latitude:standard_name = "latitude" ;
		NC_CHAR Latitude:coverage_content_type = "coordinate" ;
		NC_CHAR Latitude:long_name = "Latitude" ;
		NC_CHAR Latitude:units = "degrees_north" ;
		NC_CHAR Latitude:grid_mapping = "crs" ;
	NC_INT Elevation(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Elevation:standard_name = "sea_surface_height_above_geoid" ;
		NC_CHAR Elevation:long_name = "Elevation of the cave main entrance above the sea level" ;
		NC_CHAR Elevation:units = "meters" ;
		NC_CHAR Elevation:positive = "up" ;
		NC_CHAR Elevation:coverage_content_type = "coordinate" ;
	NC_INT Total_Length(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Total_Length:long_name = "Aggregated length of all cave sections measured during cave mapping" ;
		NC_CHAR Total_Length:coverage_content_type = "referenceInformation" ;
		NC_CHAR Total_Length:units = "meters" ;
	NC_STRING Topography(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Topography:long_name = "Surrounding topography" ;
		NC_CHAR Topography:coverage_content_type = "referenceInformation" ;
	NC_STRING Phytogeographic_Region(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Phytogeographic_Region:long_name = "Phytogeographical region" ;
		NC_CHAR Phytogeographic_Region:coverage_content_type = "auxiliaryInformation" ;
	NC_DOUBLE Main_Entrance_Width(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Main_Entrance_Width:long_name = "Maximal width of the main entrance into the cave" ;
		NC_CHAR Main_Entrance_Width:coverage_content_type = "referenceInformation" ;
		NC_CHAR Main_Entrance_Width:units = "meters" ;
		NC_DOUBLE Main_Entrance_Width:_FillValue = -999.9 ;
	NC_DOUBLE Main_Entrance_Height(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Main_Entrance_Height:long_name = "Maximal height of the main entrance into the cave" ;
		NC_CHAR Main_Entrance_Height:coverage_content_type = "referenceInformation" ;
		NC_CHAR Main_Entrance_Height:units = "meters" ;
		NC_DOUBLE Main_Entrance_Height:_FillValue = -999.9 ;
	NC_DOUBLE Secondary_Entrance_Width(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Secondary_Entrance_Width:long_name = "Maximal width of the secondary entrance into the cave if present" ;
		NC_CHAR Secondary_Entrance_Width:coverage_content_type = "referenceInformation" ;
		NC_CHAR Secondary_Entrance_Width:units = "meters" ;
		NC_DOUBLE Secondary_Entrance_Width:_FillValue = -999.9 ;
	NC_DOUBLE Secondary_Entrance_Height(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Secondary_Entrance_Height:long_name = "Maximal height of the secondary entrance into the cave if present" ;
		NC_CHAR Secondary_Entrance_Height:coverage_content_type = "referenceInformation" ;
		NC_CHAR Secondary_Entrance_Height:units = "meters" ;
		NC_DOUBLE Secondary_Entrance_Height:_FillValue = -999.9 ;
	NC_STRING Lithostratigraphy(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Lithostratigraphy:long_name = "Lithostratigraphy" ;
		NC_CHAR Lithostratigraphy:coverage_content_type = "referenceInformation" ;
	NC_STRING Cave_Formation(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Cave_Formation:long_name = "Major speleological and deformation processes that formed cave's physical characteristics" ;
		NC_CHAR Cave_Formation:coverage_content_type = "referenceInformation" ;
	NC_STRING Current_Environment(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Current_Environment:long_name = "Current microclimate environment inside a cave" ;
		NC_CHAR Current_Environment:coverage_content_type = "referenceInformation" ;
	NC_STRING Structure(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Structure:long_name = "General cave structure" ;
		NC_CHAR Structure:coverage_content_type = "referenceInformation" ;
	NC_STRING Research_History(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Research_History:long_name = "History of cave research" ;
		NC_CHAR Research_History:coverage_content_type = "referenceInformation" ;
	NC_STRING Notes(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Notes:long_name = "Miscellaneous comments on a cave metadata" ;
		NC_CHAR Notes:coverage_content_type = "auxiliaryInformation" ;
	NC_STRING Findings(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Findings:long_name = "Types of archaeological findings that were documented in cave" ;
		NC_CHAR Findings:coverage_content_type = "auxiliaryInformation" ;
	NC_STRING Occupation_Periods(cave) ;
		NC_CHAR Occupation_Periods:long_name = "List of identified periods of human activity in the cave" ;
		NC_CHAR Occupation_Periods:coverage_content_type = "auxiliaryInformation" ;
		NC_STRING Occupation_Periods:time_periods_vocabulary = "Epi: Epi Palaeolithic (23000-11500 BP), PPN: Pre-pottery Neolithic (9500-6500 BC), PN: Pottery Neolithic (6500-5600 BC), LC: Late Chalcolithic (4500-3700 BC), EBA: Early Bronze Age (3700-2450 BC), IBA: Intermeidiate Bronze Age (2450-1950 BC), MBA: Middle Bronze Age (1950-1550 BC), IA: Iron Age (1140-586 BC), HEL: Hellenistic Period (333-63 BC), ROM: Roman Period (63 BC - 324 AD), MAM: Mamluk Period (1250-1517 AD)" ;
	NC_BYTE Logger_Number_in_Cave(logger) ;
		NC_CHAR Logger_Number_in_Cave:long_name = "The sequential number of logger set in a certain cave" ;
		NC_CHAR Logger_Number_in_Cave:coverage_content_type = "auxiliaryInformation" ;
	NC_STRING Lighting_Zone(logger) ;
		NC_CHAR Lighting_Zone:long_name = "Light zone ID where logger was set" ;
		NC_CHAR Lighting_Zone:coverage_content_type = "referenceInformation" ;
		NC_STRING Lighting_Zone:lighting_zone_vocabulary = "Light: area right outside the cave's main entrance; Twilight: chiefly shadowed zone inside the cave; Dark: the place inside a cave where sunlight doesn't reach anytime" ;
	NC_INT Logger_Serial_Number(logger) ;
		NC_CHAR Logger_Serial_Number:long_name = "Logger's manufacture serial number" ;
		NC_CHAR Logger_Serial_Number:coverage_content_type = "auxiliaryInformation" ;
	NC_DOUBLE Temperature(time, logger) ;
		NC_CHAR Temperature:standard_name = "air_temperature" ;
		NC_CHAR Temperature:coverage_content_type = "physicalMeasurement" ;
		NC_CHAR Temperature:long_name = "Temperature" ;
		NC_CHAR Temperature:units = "K" ;
		NC_DOUBLE Temperature:_FillValue = -999.9 ;
	NC_DOUBLE Relative_Humidity(time, logger) ;
		NC_CHAR Relative_Humidity:standard_name = "relative_humidity" ;
		NC_CHAR Relative_Humidity:coverage_content_type = "physicalMeasurement" ;
		NC_CHAR Relative_Humidity:long_name = "Relative humidity" ;
		NC_CHAR Relative_Humidity:units = "percents" ;
		NC_DOUBLE Relative_Humidity:_FillValue = -999.9 ;
	NC_DOUBLE Dew_Point(time, logger) ;
		NC_CHAR Dew_Point:standard_name = "dew_point_temperature" ;
		NC_CHAR Dew_Point:coverage_content_type = "physicalMeasurement" ;
		NC_CHAR Dew_Point:long_name = "Dew point temperature" ;
		NC_CHAR Dew_Point:units = "K" ;
		NC_DOUBLE Dew_Point:_FillValue = -999.9 ;
	NC_DOUBLE Logger_Latitude(logger) ;
		NC_CHAR Logger_Latitude:standard_name = "latitude" ;
		NC_CHAR Logger_Latitude:long_name = "Latitude" ;
		NC_CHAR Logger_Latitude:units = "degrees_north" ;
		NC_CHAR Logger_Latitude:coverage_content_type = "coordinate" ;
		NC_CHAR Logger_Latitude:grid_mapping = "crs" ;
	NC_DOUBLE Logger_Longitude(logger) ;
		NC_CHAR Logger_Longitude:standard_name = "longitude" ;
		NC_CHAR Logger_Longitude:long_name = "Longitude" ;
		NC_CHAR Logger_Longitude:units = "degrees_east" ;
		NC_CHAR Logger_Longitude:coverage_content_type = "coordinate" ;
		NC_CHAR Logger_Longitude:grid_mapping = "crs" ;

// global attributes:
		NC_CHAR :id = "None" ;
		NC_CHAR :naming_authority = "Zenodo: zenodo.org" ;
		NC_CHAR :title = "Israel Cave Climate Project (ICCP)" ;
		NC_CHAR :summary = "Current dataset presents the current state of The Israel Cave Climate Project (ICCP) and provides high-resolution microclimatic data from twelve caves across three climate zones— Hyper-Arid Desert, Steppe, and Mediterranean—all measured during a similar time frame in 2019—2021 using a uniform protocol. All twelve are natural karstic caves containing diverse, rich, and typically multi-period archaeological records. Within each cave, hourly air temperature and relative humidity measurements were recorded over a year or so. The physical and speleological characteristics of the studied caves and the content and nature of their archaeological records are detailed." ;
		NC_CHAR :source = "surface observation" ;
		NC_CHAR :creator_type = "scholars collective" ;
		NC_CHAR :creator_name = "Micka Ullman; Mitya Kletzerman; Assaf Oron; Roee Porat; Boaz Langford; Amos Frumkin; Uri Davidovich; Nimrod Marom" ;
		NC_CHAR :creator_email = "tipa2128506@gmail.com" ;
		NC_CHAR :creator_institution = "Haifa University" ;
		NC_CHAR :creator_url = "https://www.haifa.ac.il" ;
		NC_CHAR :date_created = "2025-05-26 18:37:30 UTC" ;
		NC_CHAR :featureType = "points" ;
		NC_CHAR :instrument = "MX2302A, HOBO External Temperature/RH Sensor Data Logger, Onset Computer Corp." ;
		NC_CHAR :processing_level = "see history attribute" ;
		NC_CHAR :time_coverage_start = "2019-09-19 06:00:00" ;
		NC_CHAR :time_coverage_end = "2021-07-04 09:00:00" ;
		NC_FLOAT :geospatial_lat_min = 31.1592102050781 ;
		NC_FLOAT :geospatial_lat_max = 33.0088500976562 ;
		NC_FLOAT :geospatial_lon_min = 35.0206298828125 ;
		NC_FLOAT :geospatial_lon_max = 35.4264717102051 ;
		NC_STRING :keywords = "GCMD: GEOSCIENCES > SOLID EARTH > KARST, GCMD: EARTH SCIENCE > CLIMATE INDICATORS, GCMD: EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSPHERE > AIR TEMPERATURE, GCMD: EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSPHERE > ATMOSPHERIC TEMPERATURE > DEW POINT TEMPERATURE, GCMD: EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSPHERE > HUMIDITY > RELATIVE HUMIDITY" ;
		NC_STRING :keywords_vocabulary = "GCMD: NASA/GCMD Earth Science Keywords: https://www.earthdata.nasa.gov/learn/find-data/idn/gcmd-keywords" ;
		NC_CHAR :institution = "Haifa University" ;
		NC_CHAR :publisher_name = "Mitya Kletzerman" ;
		NC_CHAR :publisher_email = "tipa2128506@gmail.com" ;
		NC_CHAR :license = "https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/" ;
		NC_CHAR :Conventions = "ACDD-1.3, CF-1.8" ;
		NC_STRING :history = "None" ;
		NC_STRING :acknowledgement = "None" ;
}
